div.div: Hidupkan Javascript pada browser untuk melihat konten blog ini.

div.b:comment: Change `#` with your own username or user ID

b:with.value: "window.prompt(\"Copy to clipboard: Ctrl+C, Enter\", \"" + data:originalUrl + "\"); return false;"

b:include.data: { sharingId: data:sharingId, originalUrl: data:post.url, platforms: data:this.sharing.platforms, shareUrl: data:post.shareUrl, shareTitle: data:post.title, }
b:include.name: sharingButtons

b:includable.b:comment: Ripple, and show 'keep reading' as the default.

b:include.data: { sharingId: data:sharingId, originalUrl: data:post.url, platforms: data:this.sharing.platforms, shareUrl: data:post.shareUrl, shareTitle: data:post.title, }

time.expr:class: format(data:post.date, "d MMM YYYY") != format(data:post.lastUpdated, "d MMM YYYY") ? "published" : "published updated"

b:if.cond: format(data:post.date, "d MMM YYYY") != format(data:post.lastUpdated, "d MMM YYYY")

b:class.cond: format(data:post.date, "d MMM YYYY") != format(data:post.lastUpdated, "d MMM YYYY")
b:class.name: updt
